content: Unmapping PE files, fixing Alignment and Fixing coruupted/Missing PE Header
title: Unmapping PE files, fixing Alignment and Fixing corrupted/Missing PE Header

content: Steps first add the correct pe header : look for 4c 01 (cpu architecture 386 in optional header ) open the corrupted file and a known good file and copy and paste till 4c01 (use HxD) unmap : a) make the virtual address section match the raw addres section (PE bear) b) set the raw size and virual size correct formula VA of section 2 - VA of section 1 c) make reloc size 0 check and fix section allignment : move to raw address of section 1 . is the byte zeroed out correctly till the start if not add 00 bytes till the start example of adding 00 using hxd
title: Unmapping PE files, fixing Alignment and Fixing corrupted/Missing PE Header
